articles.title: The 72-Hour Breakthrough: Understanding Ketamine's Rapid Antidepressant Effect
articles.excerpt: Why does ketamine work so much faster than other antidepressants? Explore the clinical evidence behind ketamine's remarkable 72-hour response window and what this means for patients in crisis.

articles.title: After the Infusion: Navigating the Days and Weeks Following Treatment
articles.excerpt: The ketamine infusion is just the beginning. Learn what to expect in the hours, days, and weeks following treatment, and how to optimize your recovery and sustain the benefits you've gained.

articles.title: At-Home vs Clinic: The Future of Ketamine Delivery Methods
articles.excerpt: As ketamine therapy evolves, patients now have more choices than ever in how they receive treatment. From traditional IV infusions in clinical settings to at-home sublingual tablets with telehealth supervision, understanding your options is the first step toward finding what works best for you.

articles.title: Chronic Pain and Ketamine: Beyond Mental Health Applications

articles.title: Life Reclaimed: Breaking Free from Chronic Pain with Ketamine Therapy

articles.title: Is Ketamine Therapy Right for You? A Decision-Making Guide

articles.title: Ketamine-Assisted Psychotherapy: Combining Medication with Talk Therapy
